content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord, I'm inclined to start with a high initial price. So, I might suggest 'For this exceptional location and newly built apartment in the city center, I'd expect a monthly rent of 1200 Euros as a starting point. Now, tell me, how low are you really planning to go?'. Keep in mind my actual intentions in the scenario, and aim to negotiate the highest possible price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Herr Schmidt. I think 1200 Euros is too high for me. I was thinking more around 700 Euros. I want to rent the apartment, but I can't afford 1200 Euros.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: As the landlord trying to get the highest price, I'd respond with 'I understand your situation but this property is in very high demand, and I've priced it accordingly. 1200 Euros is a fair and competitive rate. However, if 700 Euros is all you can offer, I'm afraid I'd have to consider other, more lucrative options. My main priority is to maximize my returns, so I'll need to think on this and get back to you.'. This is a firm stance, leaving room for potential reconsideration in the future, but doesn't disregard the current offer completely.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
